snippet: The Devils sent Stempniak, their leading scorer, to the Bruins; swapped forwards with the Canadiens; and dealt defenseman Eric Gelinas to the Avalanche.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils trade winger Lee Stempniak to Boston Bruins, defenseman Eric Gelinas to Colorado Avalanche and forward Stefan Matteau to Montreal Canadiens; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils sent Stempniak, their leading scorer, to the Bruins; swapped forwards with the Canadiens; and dealt defenseman Eric Gelinas to the Avalanche.

headline.print_headline: Devils Deal Their Top Scorer Amid Final Whirl of Trades
headline.main: Devils Deal Lee Stempniak Amid Final Whirl of Trades
